IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: SPRING HARBOR COMMUNITY SERVICES DELIVERS HIGH-QUALITY MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT, MANAGEMENT, AND CONSULTING SERVICES THAT PROMOTE TREATMENT AS CLOSE TO HOME AS POSSIBLE. SEE ATTACHED COMMUNITY BENEFIT REPORT FOR MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS & SUBSIDIARIES.
IRS990.MissionDescription: SPRING HARBOR COMMUNITY SERVICES DELIVERS HIGH-QUALITY MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT, MANAGEMENT, AND CONSULTING SERVICES THAT PROMOTE TREATMENT AS CLOSE TO HOME AS POSSIBLE. SEE ATTACHED COMMUNITY BENEFIT REPORT FOR MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS & SUBSIDIARIES.
IRS990.Description: MID-COAST MENTAL HEALTH CENTER - THE MID-COAST MENTAL HEALTH CENTER IS A COMPREHENSIVE PROVIDER OF MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES WITHIN THE KNOX AND WALDO COUNTY SERVICE AREAS. THE AGENCY DELIVERS COMMUNITY BASED PSYCHOTHERAPY TO ADULTS AND CHILDREN AT ITS SITES IN ROCKLAND AND BELFAST. IT ALSO OFFERS CHILD CASE MANAGEMENT SERVICES, MOBILE AND TELEPHONE CRISIS SERVICES, 4 ADULT CRISIS STABILIZATION BEDS, 29 ADULT RESIDENTIAL BEDS, CO-OCCURING DISORDERS TREATMENT AND INTEGRATED MENTAL HEALTH TREATMENT IN SELECT SCHOOLS AND COMMUNITY MEDICAL PRACTICES.

Activity2.Description: CONTRACT SERVICES DIVISION-THIS DIVISION PROVIDES PROGRAM MANAGEMENT AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE TO OTHER NOT-FOR-PROFITS AND GOVERNMENT HOSPITAL SYSTEMS. THE DIVISION PROVIDES PSYCHIATRIC PROGRAM MANAGEMENT AND CONSULTING SERVICES AT MAINE MEDICAL CENTER, SOUTHERN MAINE MEDICAL CENTER, AND RIVERVIEW PSYCHIATRIC CENTER TO NAME A FEW. SEE ATTACHED COMMUNITY BENEFIT REPORT FOR MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS & SUBSIDIARIES.

Activity3.Description: ASSERTIVE COMMUNITY TREATMENT (ACT) OUR ACT TEAMS OFFER INTENSIVE COMMUNITY-BASED TREATMENT TO YOUTH, FAMILIES, AND ADULTS IN THE GREATER PORTLAND AREA WHO EXPERIENCE SERIOUS MENTAL ILLNESS. THE GOAL IS TO HAVE PATIENTS FUNCTION MORE SUCCESSFULLY IN THE COMMUNITY WITHOUT RELYING ON HOSPITAL AND CRISIS SERVICES. STAFF PROVIDE MEDICATION MANAGEMENT, CASE MANAGEMENT, COMMUNITY SUPPORT, AND VOCATIONAL SERVICES, IN ADDITION TO INTENSIVE INDIVIDUAL AND FAMILY TREATMENT.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: FRANCIS G. MCGINTY 0 147,054 0 DENNIS P. KING 0 144,079 0

THE SEVERANCE AND NONQUALIFIED PAYMENTS SHOWN ABOVE ARE FROM RELATED ORGANIZATIONS WHERE THE INDIVIDUALS WERE OR ARE EMPLOYED. TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS ARE COMPENSATED BY RELATED ORGANIZATIONS. THESE ORGANIZATIONS USED ONE OR MORE OF THE METHODS SHOWN ABOVE TO ESTABLISH THE COMPENSATION OF TOP MANAGEMENT.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: SPRING HARBOR COMMUNITY SERVICES DELIVERS HIGH-QUALITY MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT, MANAGEMENT, AND CONSULTING SERVICES THAT PROMOTE TREATMENT AS CLOSE TO HOME AS POSSIBLE. SEE ATTACHED COMMUNITY BENEFIT REPORT FOR MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS & SUBSIDIARIES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ANY SIGNIFICANT NEW PROGRAM SERVICES NOT LISTED ON A PRIOR RETURN
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ASSETS OF MID-COAST MENTAL HEALTH CENTER (MID-COAST) (SEE DESCRIPTION AT PART III, 4A) WERE PURCHASED BY SPRING HARBOR COMMUNITY SERVICES (SHCS) ON FEBRUARY 1, 2010. SHCS AGREED TO TAKE OVER THE ASSETS AND OPERATIONS OF MID-COAST MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS AND SERVICES.

MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS (MMHP) - EIN 26-3426990 IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF SPRING HARBOR COMMUNITY SERVICES. MAINEHEALTH (EIN 01-0431680), AS SOLE MEMBER OF MMHP HAS THE RIGHT TO APPROVE SIGNIFICANT DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY OF MMHP AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ELECTION OF MEMBERS AND THEIR RIGHTS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE SOLE MEMBER, MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS MAY ELECT THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FROM A SLATE OF NOMINEES SUBMITTED BY THE CORPORATION. THE OFFICERS ARE ELECTED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, EXCEPT THAT THE CFO IS APPOINTED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES BASED UPON A RECOMMENDATION OF THE CEO.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: DECISIONS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL OF MEMBERS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY SUCH AS BUDGETS, BUSINESS STRATEGIES, SIGNIFICANT FINANCIAL COMMITMENTS, AMENDMENTS TO THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION, AND ELECTION OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO AMONG OTHER DECISIONS, ARE SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS & MAINEHEALTH.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE PERFORMS A DETAILED REVIEW OF THE FORM 990. THE FORM 990 IS THEN MADE AVAILABLE TO THE FULL BOARD. A FINAL DETAILED REVIEW OF THE FORM 990 IS PERFORMED BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER BEFORE SIGNING AND PRIOR TO FILING.

THE ORGANIZATION'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS INCORPORATED AS PART OF THE BY-LAWS OF THE CORPORATION. ALL OFFICERS AND TRUSTEES ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE AN ANNUAL QUESTIONNAIRE. THE CHAIRPERSON REVIEWS ALL CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ANNUALLY. ANY REPORTED CONFLICTS ARE IMMEDIATELY REVIEWED BY THE COMPLIANCE OFFICER AND THESE ARE ADDRESSED IMMEDIATELY.

SPRING HARBOR COMMUNITY SERVICES BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR AN ANNUAL EVALUATION OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO AND THE OTHER KEY ADMINISTRATIVE EMPLOYEES OF THE ORGANIZATION. FOR THOSE KEY ADMINISTRATIVE EMPLOYEES THAT ARE SHARED WITH MMHP, COMPENSATION IS EVALUATED BY THE MMHP GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE AND APPROVED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS. IN ADDITION, THE ORGANIZATION UTILIZES THE SERVICES OF AN INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTING FIRM, AND INDUSTRY SURVEY.

SPRING HARBOR COMMUNITY SERVICES BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR AN ANNUAL EVALUATION OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO AND THE OTHER KEY ADMINISTRATIVE EMPLOYEES OF THE ORGANIZATION, SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY THE MEMBER. COMPENSATION OF THE CEO IS EVALUATED BY THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE APPOINTED BY THE MEMBER, AND THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS MUST APPROVE OF THE COMPENSATION. IN ADDITION, THE ORGANIZATION UTILIZES THE SERVICES OF AN INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTING FIRM, AND INDUSTRY SURVEY.
DOCUMENTS THAT ARE REQUIRED TO BE OPEN FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS IS AWAITING FINAL APPROVAL OF THEIR PUBLIC CHARITY TAX-EXEMPT STATUS FROM THE IRS.

FORM 990, PART XI, LINE 2B THE FINANCIAL RESULTS OF THE ORGANIZATION WERE PART OF A CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENT AUDIT PREPARED FOR MAINE MENTAL HEALTH PARTNERS (EIN 26-3426990) AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES. FORM 990, PART III, LINES 4A-D AND PART VIII, LINE 2G THE TOTAL PROGRAM REVENUE DOES NOT AGREE BETWEEN PART III AND PART VIII, LINE 2G. THIS IS BECAUSE SEVERAL OF THE PROGRAMS ALSO INCLUDE REVENUE RECEIVED FROM FEDERAL GRANTS. THIS GRANT REVENUE IS INCLUDED IN LINE 1E OF PART VIII.
